informationalVideos.title: Minute Physics: What is Gravity?
informationalVideos.description: Ditch the "pulling down" image! Minute Physics reveals gravity's true nature: bending spacetime. Every object, big or small, warps the fabric of spacetime around it, creating an "invisible hill" attracting others.

informationalVideos.title: Why is the Solar System Flat?
informationalVideos.description: The vast expanse of the cosmos may appear chaotic, filled with swirling galaxies and countless stars. Yet, within our own solar system, order reigns supreme, evidenced by the remarkable flatness of its planetary dance. This flattened disk, resembling a celestial ballet performed across billions of years.

informationalVideos.title: Evolution vs Natural Selection
informationalVideos.description: While often used interchangeably, 'evolution' and 'natural selection' are distinct concepts within the theory of biological evolution. Understanding the difference between them is crucial for grasping the mechanisms that drive the diversity of life on Earth.

informationalVideos.title: How Modern Light Bulbs Work
informationalVideos.description: The light bulb, a seemingly simple invention, has had a profound impact on humanity. More than just illuminating darkness, it has revolutionized our lives, shaping our work, leisure, and understanding of the world around us.

informationalVideos.title: 27 Facts That Will Make You Question Your Existence
informationalVideos.description: If we're simulated, the question of existence transcends individual lives. The purpose of the simulation becomes paramount, leading to existential inquiries about its creators, their motivations, and our role within their experiment. Does their existence diminish ours, or could they offer insight into a larger reality?

informationalVideos.title: Earth's Evolution in 10 Minutes
informationalVideos.description: Imagine you have a time machine that can condense 4.5 billion years into 10 minutes. Buckle up, because we're about to embark on a whirlwind journey through Earth's remarkable evolution!
